name: openapi-format
description: Format an OpenAPI document by ordering, formatting and filtering fields.
author: Tim Haselaars

scripts.split-storefront: node bin/cli.js https://openapi.commercengine.io/ce-storefront.json --splitByTags --output storefront/main.json && npm run clean-storefront
scripts.split-admin: node bin/cli.js https://openapi.commercengine.io/ce-admin.json --splitByTags --output admin/main.json && npm run clean-admin
scripts.clean-storefront: for f in storefront/*.json; do openapi spec clean "$f" -w; done
scripts.clean-admin: for f in admin/*.json; do openapi spec clean "$f" -w; done
scripts.split-all: npm run split-storefront && npm run split-admin
scripts.merge-storefront: node bin/cli.js ./storefront --mergeByTags --output storefront.openapi.json && openapi spec clean storefront.openapi.json -w
scripts.merge-admin: node bin/cli.js ./admin --mergeByTags --output admin.openapi.json && openapi spec clean admin.openapi.json -w
scripts.merge-all: npm run merge-storefront && npm run merge-admin
scripts.lint-storefront-specs: for f in storefront/*.json; do speakeasy lint openapi --schema="$f" --logLevel warn --non-interactive; done
scripts.lint-admin-specs: for f in admin/*.json; do speakeasy lint openapi --schema="$f" --logLevel warn --non-interactive; done
scripts.lint-all: npm run lint-storefront-specs && npm run lint-admin-specs
scripts.lint-all-merged: npm run lint-storefront-merged && npm run lint-admin-merged
